name: biomni-query-mpd
title: Biomni: Query Mpd
description: Query the Mouse Phenome Database for standardized phenotypic data on laboratory mouse strains.
content:
Overview

Searches the Mouse Phenome Database containing baseline phenotype data for commonly used laboratory mouse strains, supporting QTL analysis and comparative phenomics.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query about mouse phenotypes
  • endpoint (string, optional): Specific MPD API endpoint
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable detailed logging

Biological Use Case

Critical for mouse genetics, strain selection, and understanding genetic contributions to complex traits. Researchers use MPD to compare phenotypes across strains, identify appropriate models, analyze QTL data, and understand strain-specific disease susceptibilities.

Output

Returns JSON (mpd_results.json) with phenotype measurements across strains including behavioral, physiological, and metabolic data, strain information, protocols, statistics, and publication links.

Category

database
